HotelElement.Name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Jr Noda Ekimae

Description.Text: The Toyoko Inn Osaka JR Noda Ekimae is a hotel..

The hotel is situated within 2 minutes' walk of the JR Noda station and near to exit 1 of Tamagawa station on the Osaka Sennichimae line. Facilities Wireless internet access, a restaurant and a newspaper stand are available to guests. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park for a fee. Rooms The accommodation units each feature a double bed. Facilities include a safe, a fridge and internet access. In the bathrooms, guests will find a bathtub and a hairdryer.
